SEARCH
Package rational

Class RationalRole

java.lang.Object
BESA.Kernel.Agent.Event.DataBESA
rational.RationalRole
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RationalRole extends BESA.Kernel.Agent.Event.DataBESA
The RationalRole class represents a role that an agent can adopt in the Rational Agent framework. It contains a role name and a plan associated with that role.
See Also:
